Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute at Madison/Hamlin
ShortDescription: 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Pulaski, Washington, Hamlin abd Madison due to, street blockage near Madison/Hamlin

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Madison, Pulaski, Washington, Hamlin abd Madison due to, street blockage near Madison/Hamlin

Allow extra travel time.
